reflect_result: By clicking on the "Add to Cart" button, the MacBook Air has been added to the shopping cart. The shopping cart has 4 items in total, which means that the last action has successfully advanced us towards completing the user request to show the shopping cart on Amazon with the "MacBook Air" added to it.
